                function() {
                    (b[l].q = b[l].q || []).push(arguments)
                });

            e = o.createElement(i);
            r = o.getElementsByTagName(i)[0];
            e.src = 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js';
            r.parentNode.insertBefore(e, r)
        }(window, document, 'script', 'ga'));
